entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain ending early this morning then mainly cloudy with showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
